snippet.title: Paper Mario: Black Pit - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Black Pit is a romhack for Paper Mario N64.

I know this was supposed to be released half a year ago, it took a lot longer but I think was worth it.
I have been making this mod for more than 2 years, I put a lot of care and passion into it, so I really hope all those Paper Mario fans out there like it.

I want to give special thanks to the following people :D
Rain - For teaching ASM and for helping me a lot of times
Alex/nanaland - Documentation and a lot of really useful stuff that made modding a lot easier
Clover - Paper Mario Modding tool creator and a LOT of documentation
And all the people from the Paper Mario Modding Discord Server.

Download Link (last version 1.3.5 - 27/Sept/2022):
https://github.com/eldexterr/pmblackpit/releases

Remember to join the Paper Mario Modding Server to stay updated for new updates
on Black Pit and other PM cool mods:
https://discord.gg/pUWj6ss

How to play:
If you're playing on emulator remember to set the RAM to 8MB, for PJ64 remember to disable Register Caching too

Artwork by @KevinArthurLS
Trailer Music by BrokenMug & dopamix

Remember to subscribe for more Paper Mario modding!

Patreon:
https://www.patreon.com/eldexter
